journey.start_of_journey: My interest in IT began in 2021, where I was fascinated by how technology works. During the COVID pandemic I didn't know what I wanted to do in life, so I decided to pursue a degree in IT to deepen my understanding and skills. During my degree I started developing a very keen interest for DevOps and Cybersecurity, which is the kind of career I want to achieve in the near future.

milestones.description: Started my IT degree not having any knowledge or experience in IT at all.
Got a certification in Fortinet Certified Fundamentals in Cybersecurity
Started creating my own personal blog (this website)

challenges.description: Struggled with programming (starting with C#) in the first year, as I have never programmed in any capacity before starting the degree.
challenges.solution: Participated in tutorials, study groups and sought help from professors to improve my understanding.

skills.name: Cloud Computing
skills.details: Gained experience with AWS, Microsoft Azure, and Fortinet through coursework.

skills.name: Cybersecurity
skills.details: Developed skills in threat detection and prevention through various projects.

journey.future_aspirations: I aim to specialize in cloud architecture and cybersecurity, working on innovative solutions to protect and optimize digital environments.
